NoPerms: <size=12>You do not have permission to use <color=#00a7fe>{0}</color>!</size>
Help: <size=12>Bind a key to a FarmTools command using the F1 console</size>
HelpClone:
<size=12>Take clone from a single plant
<color=#00a7fe>bind <key> farmtools.clone</color>
chat command: <color=#00a7fe>/clone</color></size>
HelpCloneAll:
<size=12>Take all clones from a planter
<color=#00a7fe>bind <key> farmtools.cloneall</color>
chat command: <color=#00a7fe>/cloneall</color></size>
HelpHarvestAll:
<size=12>Harvest all plants or remove dying plants from a planter
<color=#00a7fe>bind <key> farmtools.harvestall</color>
chat command: <color=#00a7fe>/harvestall</color></size>
HelpPlantAll:
<size=12>Plant all seeds in the target planter
<color=#00a7fe>bind <key> farmtools.plantall</color>
chat command: <color=#00a7fe>/plantall</color></size>
HelpGenes:
<size=12>Copy genes from a planter box or storage container
<color=#00a7fe>bind <key> farmtools.genes</color>
chat command: <color=#00a7fe>/genes</color></size>
GeneNote:
A note with genes has been added to your inventory.

Genes can also be copied from the F1 console with <color=#00a7fe>console.copy</color>.
InvalidGeneEntity: Unable to find genes! Look at a <color=#00a7fe>Planter Box</color> or <color=#00a7fe>Storage Container</color> and try again.
